attributes.action: call a national referendum and let the people to decide, if they want an opt-in or opt-out human organ donor system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the Spirit of the New Prime Minister's inclusive approach to politics I would like to call for a referendum and cross party debate, so stimulating a national discussion about organ donations. Everyone should have a say about how we care for the sick and show respect for the departed.
